scripts.dev:seed: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed && npm run dev
scripts.test:e2e: NODE_ENV=test npx prisma migrate deploy && env -u NO_COLOR -u FORCE_COLOR NODE_ENV=test playwright test --config=e2e/playwright.config.ts
scripts.test:e2e:fast: env -u NO_COLOR -u FORCE_COLOR NODE_ENV=test playwright test --config=e2e/playwright.config.ts --workers=8 --timeout=15000
scripts.test:e2e:smoke: env -u NO_COLOR -u FORCE_COLOR NODE_ENV=test playwright test --config=e2e/playwright.config.ts --grep='smoke'
scripts.test:e2e:ui: env -u NO_COLOR -u FORCE_COLOR NODE_ENV=test playwright test --ui --config=e2e/playwright.config.ts
scripts.test:e2e:preview: env -u NO_COLOR -u FORCE_COLOR NODE_ENV=test npm run build && npm start 2>&1 | head -1 && env -u NO_COLOR -u FORCE_COLOR NODE_ENV=test playwright test --config=e2e/playwright.config.ts
scripts.test:e2e:admin: env -u NO_COLOR -u FORCE_COLOR NODE_ENV=test playwright test --config=e2e/playwright.config.ts --project=admin
scripts.test:e2e:staff: env -u NO_COLOR -u FORCE_COLOR NODE_ENV=test playwright test --config=e2e/playwright.config.ts --project=staff
scripts.test:e2e:slow: env -u NO_COLOR -u FORCE_COLOR NODE_ENV=test playwright test --config=e2e/playwright.config.ts -g @slow
scripts.posttest:e2e: echo '\nüîç Failing test artifacts:' && find test-results -name '*.zip' -o -name '*.webm' | head -10 || echo 'No artifacts found'
scripts.e2e: env -u NO_COLOR -u FORCE_COLOR NODE_ENV=test playwright test --config=e2e/playwright.config.ts
